price: Hakika wachamngu watakuwa na Bustani za neema kwa Mola wao Mlezi.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
footnotes: Hakika wachamngu watapata kwa Mola wao Mlezi Bustani za neema safi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
